title: IStructureSystemSplitMember.SplitLengthRevDirection
description: Gets and sets whether to reverse the direction of the length of this dimension split member.
returns: True to reverse the direction of the length, false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only for
IStructureSystemSplitMember::DimensionType
set to
swSplitMemberDimensionType_e
.swSplitMemberDimensionType_SplitLength.
